snippet.title: AdventureQuest Infinity Teaser Trailer - We are remaking AQWorlds into a cross-platform online world
snippet.description:
AdventureQuest Worlds Infinity is coming!  https://www.AQ2D.com 

Wishlist the game on STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1979810/AdventureQuest_Worlds_Infinity/ 

It is a cross-platform remake of AdventureQuest Worlds....

FEATURES
* Cross Platform (Steam PC/Mac, Phones, and Tablets)
* Login with your existing AQWorlds character (or create a new one)
* You will have all your stuff
* 60+ Frames per second
* Keyboard & Gamepad support
* Remastered storyline being released in weekly-ish updates


FOLLOW ARTIX ENTERTAINMENT
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ArtixKrieger
• Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/artixkrieger
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/artix/
• YouTube: https://www.artix.com/youtube
• Itch.io: https://artixgames.itch.io
• Discord: https://www.artix.com/Discord
• Website: https://www.Artix.com
